author: rich
msg: This is a contribution from Abdessattar Sassi to give us a Tomcat 5.5.x ServletContainerAdapter.  I modified this to leave the 5.0.x one in the tree, with this new one as a peer.  Eventually both of these will move to another location in the tree, where they can be released independently from the rest of the code.
tests: bvt in netui, drt in netui/test/webapps/tomcat against both 5.0.28 and 5.5.9 (WinXP)
